text: Anderson Emanuel Castelo Branco Cruz (born 9 April 1996), sometimes known as just Anderson, is an Angolan professional footballer who plays for Bolivian club Club Bolívar as a left winger. ==Club career== Born in Luanda, Anderson moved to Lisboa at the age of four and finished his formation with Varzim S.C.. He made his senior debut with the reserves in the 2015–16 season. On 2 February 2016, Anderson signed for Tercera División side Verín CF, on loan from Ourense CF. He returned to his parent club for the 2016–17 campaign, scoring ten goals and achieving promotion to the fourth level. On 26 August 2017 Anderson moved to Segunda División B side Rápido de Bouzas, still owned by Ourense. The following 18 January, he signed a four-year contract with La Liga side Deportivo Alavés, being immediately loaned to parent club NK Rudeš until the end of the season. Anderson made his professional debut on 11 February 2018, starting in a 2–2 away draw against NK Lokomotiva. Five days later he scored his first professional goal, as he netted the first in a 2–0 home win against NK Inter Zaprešić. On 25 May 2018, Anderson was loaned to Ligue 2 side FC Sochaux-Montbéliard until the end of the 2018–19 season. On 27 July of the following year, he moved to Segunda División side CF Fuenlabrada also in a temporary deal. On 1 September 2020, Anderson signed for Liga Nacional de Fútbol Profesional side Club Bolívar. ==References== ==External links== * * * * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Luanda Category:Angolan footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Segunda División B players Category:Tercera División players Category:Deportivo Alavés players Category:CF Fuenlabrada footballers Category:Croatian First Football League players Category:NK Rudeš players Category:Ligue 2 players Category:Championnat National 3 players Category:FC Sochaux-Montbéliard players Category:Club Bolívar players Category:Angolan expatriate footballers Category:Angolan expatriate sportspeople in Portugal Category:Angolan expatriate sportspeople in Spain Category:Angolan expatriate sportspeople in France Category:Angolan expatriates in Bolivia Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal Category:Expatriate footballers in Spain Category:Expatriate footballers in Croatia Category:Expatriate footballers in France Category:Expatriate footballers in Bolivia
title: Anderson Emanuel
